message: The simplest way and available world-wide. Work on stuff using it. Build sites, Start small and easy and keep going. It's still one of the best ways to really learn.
I know @zedshaw sometimes teaches classes on pure Python in the Bay area. We teach classes here in Los Angeles if he can make it down south.
There is a DevHouse on May 9th at Hacker Dojo, and I'm sure I won't be the only Django person there :-)
and there have been random "help me with Django stuff" sessions at Dojo in the past
